generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and traffic arrows, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in the median strip.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- traffic sign: A "No Parking" sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, above the sidewalk.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, and a red car is visible driving ahead in the right lane.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
